text:
Hi Ben,
Sorry for the late reply I was off ill yesterday. 
Glad to connect. Yeah, I’ve been at blue zoo coming up on a year now. Was it the storyboard internship you applied for? I’ve mentored two people before but not on this platform. 

First things then, do you have a reel or story portfolio for me to look at? And also, what kind of work are you trying to get? (Tv animation/feature animation/live action)
